facts.text: I have dark stripes on my sides like a tiger! They fade as I grow up.
I'll eat almost anything! License plates and tires have been found in my stomach.
I have super sharp teeth that can crack turtle shells!
I can grow up to 14 feet long! I'm one of the largest sharks.
I'm most active at night when I hunt for food!

profile.habitat: Warm coastal and open waters worldwide
profile.diet: Fish, turtles, seabirds, and almost anything
